    IChannel, ICreationTime, IMentionable, ISnowflake

extends IChannel

        Returns:

      • getPinnedMessages

        <T extends ITextChannel> Map<Long,IMessage> getPinnedMessages()
        Checks if any of the channel's cached messages are pinned to the channel, and returns all cached messages that are pinned.
        Returns:
        A HashMap of pinned messages. Indexed by message.id.

      • getTyping

        Map<Long,IUser> getTyping()
        Returns:
        A HashMap of typing users. Indexed by User.id.

      • isTyping

        boolean isTyping(IUser author)
        Checks if a certain user is typing in this channel
        Parameters:
        author - The user to check.
        Returns:
        true if the user is typing, false otherwise.
